TROJAN !!! DONT DOWNLOAD IT !!!!!!!!!!!
SEE THE COMMENTS< THEY ARE ALL MADE ONE MONTH TO CONVINCE YOU THAT MORE THAN ONE GUY LIKED THE FILE

Just noticed the hysterical comment from bsarider. Could I just say that, nine months on from when I downloaded this, it's worked flawlessly, my pc hasn't exploded and nor has my sat-nav. 
But hey, if you're worried, don't download it, it's your loss, not mine. 
I'd always recommend downloading into a sandbox, then scan the download, and when you're sure its safe, then install it. If even that leaves you worried, then go buy the damn program. Simple innit?
